properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用数据脱敏功能

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.strategy
properties.description: 脱敏策略: mask(掩码) | encrypt(加密)

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.json-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用JSON序列化脱敏

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.method-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用方法返回值脱敏(AOP切面)

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.encrypt.algorithm
properties.description: 加密算法: AES | DES | RSA

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.encrypt.key
properties.description: 加密密钥

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.encrypt.iv
properties.description: 加密初始化向量(IV)

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.encrypt.base64-encode
properties.description: 加密结果是否使用Base64编码

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.phone-pattern
properties.description: 手机号脱敏正则表达式

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.phone-replacement
properties.description: 手机号脱敏替换规则

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.id-card-pattern
properties.description: 身份证号脱敏正则表达式

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.id-card-replacement
properties.description: 身份证号脱敏替换规则

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.email-pattern
properties.description: 邮箱脱敏正则表达式

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.email-replacement
properties.description: 邮箱脱敏替换规则

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.bank-card-pattern
properties.description: 银行卡号脱敏正则表达式

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.bank-card-replacement
properties.description: 银行卡号脱敏替换规则

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.name-pattern
properties.description: 姓名脱敏正则表达式

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.name-replacement
properties.description: 姓名脱敏替换规则

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.address-pattern
properties.description: 地址脱敏正则表达式

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.mask.address-replacement
properties.description: 地址脱敏替换规则

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.log.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用脱敏日志

properties.name: jeecg.desensitization.log.level
properties.description: 脱敏日志级别: DEBUG | INFO | WARN | ERROR

values.description: 掩码策略: 使用*号隐藏部分信息
加密策略: 使用加密算法加密敏感信息
